2.æ¸²æŸ“æ¨¡å¼

redirect- å®šä¹‰æœåŠ¡å™¨ç«¯é‡å®šå‘ã€‚
ssr- ç¦ç”¨åº”ç”¨å„éƒ¨åˆ†çš„æœåŠ¡å™¨ç«¯å‘ˆç°ï¼Œå¹¶ä½¿å…¶ä»…ä½¿ç”¨ SPAssr: false

staticå’Œ - å¯ç”¨å•ä¸ªï¼ˆæŒ‰éœ€ï¼‰æ„å»º; å¯ç”¨é™æ€æ„å»ºï¼Œè¯¥æ„å»ºæŒç»­å¯é…ç½®çš„ TTLã€‚ï¼ˆç›®å‰åœ¨Netlifyä¸Šæ”¯æŒå®Œå…¨å¢é‡é™æ€ç”Ÿæˆï¼ŒVercelå³å°†æ¨å‡ºï¼‰swrstaticswr

export default defineNuxtConfig({
  routeRules: {
    // Static page generated on-demand, revalidates in background
    '/blog/**': { swr: true },
    // Static page generated on-demand once
    '/articles/**': { static: true },
    // Set custom headers matching paths
    '/_nuxt/**': { headers: { 'cache-control': 's-maxage=0' } },
    // Render these routes with SPA
    '/admin/**': { ssr: false },
    // Add cors headers
    '/api/v1/**': { cors: true },
    // Add redirect headers
    '/old-page': { redirect: '/new-page' },
    '/old-page2': { redirect: { to: '/new-page', statusCode: 302 } }
  }
})
